variants.Description in input context: This variant has been identified as a known pathogenic mutation.

Material used.Material Name: MDA-MB-231 cells (human breast cancer cell line)

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression was significantly reduced for the variant NM_000546.3:c.729G>A.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each sample.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type TP53 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% in the presence of wild-type TP53 cDNA.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 20% in the presence of mutated TP53 cDNA.
